item.title: META
item.description: score:-3 Chances: Positive anticipation for Meta’s artificial intelligence announcements and AI tools. Meta’s focus on AI coding software and AI models for writing computer code. Strong performance of Meta stock, including a rise of 138% in the first half of 2023. Launch of AI coding software to compete with OpenAI seen as a positive move.
